extendedInfo.description: With this app, you can list your incoming bills.You can make sure to pay them in time with the notification settings.With this app you will not forget to pay back people you lend money from.A sum function lists the total cost of your bills.

reviews.title: incorrect one star rating
reviews.comment: The one star rating for \"not being able to add a date\" is incorrect! Offcourse you can add a date to a billitem so please check the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: REALLY DUMB
reviews.comment: What good is a bill reminder that you cannot set a date in. I can do this with a stickey note on the refrigerator. Poorly thought out app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Set up sound notifications on my device, did not receive them on the due date of my bills, worthless app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rating
reviews.comment: I have just setup a vill so giving a half rating.  No issues, set it to notify 7 days in advance of due date at 0900hrs.  Once this time comes and I get a warning it will get 4 full stars.  Nothing gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: jamie b

reviews.comment: Currency says euros and that\'s annoying, delete
reviews.author: Ricky Beglau
